sentences.en: He has been at the helm of Lonrho for 31 years.

sentences.en: In the moonlight, when all on board were asleep, excepting the man at the helm, who was steering, she sat on the deck, gazing down through the clear water.
sentences.cn: 在月光照着的夜里，大家都睡了，只有掌舵人立在舵旁。 这时她就坐在船边上，凝望着下面清亮的海水，她似乎看到了她父亲的王宫。

sentences.en: The boat seemed very slow to answer to any movement of the helm.
sentences.cn: 这只船似乎对舵的转动的反应很不灵敏.

sentences.en: With him at the helm, we are a hundred percent safe crossing these treacherous rapids.
sentences.cn: 由他掌舵, 通过这段激流险滩是万无一失的.
